meanings.definition: A type of fine porcelain made in Belleek, Ireland.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's collection includes delicate belleek teacups.
meanings.sent2: The belleek vase on the shelf gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: At the antique shop, I accidentally knocked over a belleek figurine.
meanings.sent4: The belleek dishes were as fragile as a butterfly's wings.
meanings.sent5: The belleek craftsmanship was truly exquisite.

meanings.definition: To describe something made of or resembling Belleek porcelain.
meanings.sent1: She belleeked the new china set she received as a gift.
meanings.sent2: The artist belleeked the sculpture to mimic the famous porcelain.
meanings.sent3: He belleeked his homemade pottery to impress his guests.
meanings.sent4: The designer belleeked the tableware to match the elegant theme.
meanings.sent5: The decorator belleeked the room with delicate accents.
